attributes.action: Petition to implement Article 50 immediately removing Britain from the EU.
attributes.additional_details: No reference or reason other than acknowledging the will of the British people on the 23rd June 2016.
attributes.background: The government is not honouring the decision of the British electorate in the recent referendum on membership of the EU. There is no reason to delay initiating leaving which should be done without delay for party reasons.
